trans-unit.source: Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Operations - Retail for IT Pros and developers | Microsoft Docs
This page lists the resources that are available for IT Pros and developers who support Retail and commerce in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Operations.
Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Operations - Retail for IT Pros and developers

[Components of Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Operations - Retail](http://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/components-of-microsoft-dynamics-365-for-operations-retail/) [Retail Store Scale Unit overview](http://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/retail-store-system-before-you-begin/)

Retail Cloud POS in a shared environment](http://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/securing-retail-cloud-pos-for-dynamics-ax-on-a-shared-environment/) [Install the POS Layout designer](http://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/install-the-pos-layout-designer/) [Use Retail Modern POS in offline mode](https://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/Use-Retail-Modern-POS-in-offline-mode/) [Call a new or customized CRT service in offline mode](https://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/how-to-call-newcustomized-crt-service-in-offline/) [Modern POS and Cloud POS trigger extensibility](https://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/modern-pos-and-cloud-pos-trigger-extensibility/) [Add a new custom control to an MPOS screen layout](https://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/add-new-custom-control-in-mpos-screen-layout/) [Implementing a return policy by using triggers](https://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/trigger-example-return-policy/) [Blocking a transaction by using triggers](https://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/trigger-example-blocking-a-transaction/) [Retail POS screen layouts](https://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/pos-screen-layouts/) [Add extension properties to a Customer entity](http://ax.help.dynamics.com/en/wiki/add-extension-properties/)
